description: Main source file for a Flutter application. Sets up theming, the main app widget, and a home page with neon-themed UI components.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the application, responsible for setting up theme and home page.

classes.name: HomePage
classes.description: Main content widget displaying neon-themed header, description, role pills, and exploration button.

classes.name: _RolePill
classes.description: A small widget representing a role badge with icon and label.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point. Calls runApp with MyApp.

methods.name: _buildTheme
methods.description: Constructs and returns the application's color scheme and theme data.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for MyApp and HomePage, setting up material theme and UI components.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for HomePage, including app bar, neon header, role showcase, and call-to-action button.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the neon role pill widget with icon and label styling.
